Package com.org.Traini8.validators

Class ContactPhoneValidator

java.lang.Object
com.org.Traini8.validators.ContactPhoneValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.validation.ConstraintValidator<ValidContactPhone,String>
public class ContactPhoneValidator extends Object implements jakarta.validation.ConstraintValidator<ValidContactPhone,String>
This class implements ConstraintValidator to provide custom validation logic for a contact phone number. It verifies if the phone number meets a specific pattern.

      public void initialize(ValidContactPhone constraint)

      Specified by:

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid(String value, jakarta.validation.ConstraintValidatorContext context)
      Implements the validation logic to check if a given string (phone number) is valid. The phone number is considered valid if it is not null and matches the predefined regex pattern.
      Specified by:
      isValid in interface jakarta.validation.ConstraintValidator<ValidContactPhone,String>
      Parameters:
      value - The phone number to validate.
      context - Context in which the constraint is evaluated.
      Returns:
      true if the phone number is valid, false otherwise.
